name: Zenon Sling
description:
This is Zenon, the orange ball. His hobby is climbing. He always wants to get to the highest places. Think you can help him? Launch him into areas that match his color and avoid blue obstacles. On his way, Zenon will encounter various types of them - some can move, others switch their position or rotate. They will test your puzzle solving and timing skills. Always try to choose a proper moment, aim carefully and observe how the obstacles behave. With these skills you can become the Zenon Sling master!

- Launch Zenon and stick him to the orange safe zones
- Look out for the blue obstacles, they hurt Zenon!
- Don't let Zenon fall!
- Test your aiming skills and get the best score!
